definition: stick/club/cudgel/smart/capable/strong/wonderful/classifier for legs of a relay race

sentences.english: To hit(a ball) into the air just beyond the infield.
sentences.chinese: 棒球場分爲內場和外場。

sentences.english: Depend on intuition and experience, he ases if the key that found baseball of the gold dollar that defeat solution.
sentences.chinese: 憑藉直覺和經驗，他彷彿找到了破解金元棒球的鑰匙。

sentences.english: The thugs beat him senseless with a baseball bat.
sentences.chinese: 暴徒用棒球棒把他打得失去了知覺。

sentences.english: He and my mama wrapped him in my baseball jacket.
sentences.chinese: 他和我的媽媽把斯齊普裹在我的棒球衫裏。

sentences.english: Owing to the rain, the baseball game was interrupted.
sentences.chinese: 由於暴雨，那場棒球比賽被中斷了。

sentences.english: That player is a real slugger .
sentences.chinese: 那個運動員是一個真正的棒球強擊手。

sentences.english: In 1981, a seven - week - old Major League Baseball strike ended.
sentences.chinese: 1981年，美國職業棒球長達七週大聯盟罷工結束。

sentences.english: Dick fell for baseball when he was a little boy.
sentences.chinese: 當迪克還是個小孩時，他就迷戀上了棒球運動。

sentences.english: He offered the young left-handed pitcher a job playing baseball for six months.
sentences.chinese: 他提供了年輕的左投手的工作打了六個月棒球。

sentences.english: In high school, he spurned baseball.
sentences.chinese: 在高中時期，他就堅決不打棒球。

sentences.english: Particles are as spread out as baseball outfielders.
sentences.chinese: 這些粒子就像棒球外野手那樣，散得很開。

sentences.english: Only a surging Kansas City Royals team buoyed my spirits.
sentences.chinese: 只有剛出道不久的堪薩斯皇家棒球隊能鼓舞我的精神。

sentences.english: It's a year — as those of us who love baseball would say — for swinging for the fences.
sentences.chinese: 熱愛棒球的人會說，這是打全壘打的一年。

sentences.english: The man says that he will be wearing a red baseball cap.
sentences.chinese: 那人稱他會戴一頂紅色棒球帽。

sentences.english: Q. Whowas the first President to play Little League baseball?
sentences.chinese: 誰是第一個加入過少年棒球聯賽的總統？

definition: football played with oval-shaped ball (rugby, American football, Australian rules etc)
